√spand 'quiver'

present: [1.] spandate etc. V.+  spandati etc. E.+  

[perfect: paspande  aspandiṣṭa  spandiṣyate  spanditā  ]

verbal: spandita  spanditum  

secondary: intensive: paniṣpad-   -- desiderative: pispandiṣa-   -- causative: spandayati  spandayate etc. B.+  

derivatives: spanda E.+  spandin C.  spandaná AV.+  paniṣpadá AV.
